channel.title: A karamja fisherman
channel.description: Is it possible in SCAR? I could see there being a problem in the constant moving of the pixels in the fish pool, as well as all fish having the same color making it hard to target a specific fish (I wanted lobs). If anyone wanted to make, or link me to an existant karamja lobster fisher/banker, that would be great (Although I suppose I could use a power fisher since I just need exp)!

item.title: A karamja fisherman
item.dc:creator: @HCL HCL
item.description:
@HCL wrote:

Im thinking of making one myself, but on a color based bot how would it differentiate between a net fishing spot, a cage fishing spot, and a whirlpool? This gets me hung up. The only thing I could think of is making the bot carry like 5 lobster pots (obviously autoer behavior and very inneficient) and try to switch fishing spots every few seconds. Of course, with SRL it is possible to avoid ents with powercutters even though they still use the same color pattens as the base tree. I am new to this and would like to know if we could make this happen

Read full topic
